Summary: Increase Sales
Description: This epic includes user stories that focus on improving the sales process
Acceptance Criteria: Increase sales to 50 books per day

Summary: Marketing Strategy
Description: This epic includes user stories that focus on implementing a marketing strategy
Acceptance Criteria: Implement a marketing strategy to reach the desired state

Summary: Track sales performance in real-time
Description: As a sales manager, I want to be able to track sales performance in real-time so that I can make informed decisions.
Acceptance Criteria: Sales performance is displayed in real-time

Summary: Access customer information and sales history
Description: As a sales representative, I want to be able to access customer information and sales history so that I can provide personalized service.
Acceptance Criteria: Customer information and sales history are accessible

Summary: Analyze sales data and adjust marketing campaigns
Description: As a marketing manager, I want to be able to analyze sales data and adjust marketing campaigns accordingly so that I can optimize marketing efforts.
Acceptance Criteria: Sales data is analyzed and marketing campaigns are adjusted

Summary: Create and schedule social media posts
Description: As a marketing manager, I want to be able to create and schedule social media posts so that I can increase brand awareness.
Acceptance Criteria: Social media posts are created and scheduled

Summary: Access analytics on content performance
Description: As a content creator, I want to be able to access analytics on content performance so that I can refine content strategy.
Acceptance Criteria: Analytics on content performance are accessible

Summary: Track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns
Description: As a campaign manager, I want to be able to track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns so that I can make data-driven decisions.
Acceptance Criteria: Effectiveness of marketing campaigns is tracked

Test the sales performance tracking feature
